data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AURORA cruise from English Bay to Antigua started at 1778-05-18

Ship: Aurora (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: English Bay, Antigua - Antigua, 1st Observer: James Cumming (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Nicholas (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 32G 679BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
